subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Hartwick College’s 72-70 victory over Utica College on Saturday broke the all-division N.C.A.A. scoring record for the second time in less than a month. On Oct. 27, Weber State beat Portland State, 73-68, to break a 38-year-old record.The Utica-Hartwick game included 20 touchdowns, 1,042 yards of total offense and 52 first downs.
